column4: hallo ich habe folgendes problem : ich wollte einen 42" Plasma als monitor benutzen aber die anzeige überlappt den darstellungsbereich. wie könnte ich das anpassen?
i want to use a 42" Plasma for Display but the picture is bigger than the area of the screen - what can i do ?
claw what's the res set at ?
claw mine is 1920x1080 and fits perfectly, check you tv picture format settings
I mean the tv picture setting , make sure it isn't zoomed
yes just did that its a ubuntu problem
i have another maschiene connected and it works there
what model tv ..I'm connected to a 42" panasonic plasma
